event_title: Die For What You Believe In

interactivity.to_get_this_event: Autoplays after " Where Puppies Roam Free " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " What's Done is Done " .

progression.synopsis: After eating breakfast, Sensei runs into Maya and Molly . Molly mentions that Futaba , who wasn't at last night's D&D session , wasn't feeling well and has gone back to the dorms. Maya notes that Ami took a long time to wake Sensei up earlier. The conversation ends when Maya spots Karin about to commit a crime and rushes to prevent it.
trivia: There is variation in the dialogue depending on if Sensei saw Wake Up Call .

event_references.event_default_name: Die For What You Believe In

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.8.
